definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: DG Interpretation Alumni Association in China. … DG Interpretation Alumni.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲委员会口译总司中国校友会。

sentences.english: They do not provide word-for-word or literal interpretation, nor do you want them to do so.
sentences.chinese: 一名口译员曾对我讲过他被要求口译证词的事。

sentences.english: They do not provide word-for-word or literal interpretation, nor do you want them to do so.
sentences.chinese: 一名口译员曾对我讲过他被要求口译证词的事。

sentences.english: One interpreter handles American sign language.
sentences.chinese: 一个口译员负责处理美国手语。

sentences.english: My major is English translation and interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 我的专业是英语翻译和口译。

sentences.english: This thesis revolves about the implications we can draw from Relevance-Adjustability Theoretical Approach (RATA in short) for the teaching of interpretation for political affairs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要探讨了关联顺应理论对政务口译教学的启示。

sentences.english: NO computer or any devices alike could replace interpretor.
sentences.chinese: 口译员是任何电脑或翻译设备所无法替代的。

sentences.english: Susan has been on loan to the affiliated plant as an interpreter since last month.
sentences.chinese: 苏姗从上个工始就被借调到附属厂去当口译人员。

sentences.english: Have you ever thought of being an interpreter someday?
sentences.chinese: 你有想过有一天做口译员吗？

sentences.english: This paper introduces two models for interpreter training: Daniel Gile' s Model and the Xiamen University Mod- el.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过对吉尔口译训练模式与厦门大学。

sentences.english: Have a gift for languages, want to become an interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 有语言天赋，想成为一名口译员。

sentences.english: Chapter III is related to the significant role short-term memory plays in interpreting.
sentences.chinese: 口译中短时记忆的角色及重要作用。

sentences.english: I worked for the product launch of Pearl River - Supra White Beer yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天为珠江啤酒的雪堡垒白啤酒的发布会做口译。

sentences.english: The present Chinese interpretation teaching situation is, on different teaching levels, problem- ridden .
sentences.chinese: 当前中国口译教学在不同层次存在着不同问题。

sentences.english: In the1920s, archaeologists discovered the complete skull of Peking Man.
sentences.chinese: 考古学家发现了一块完整的北京猿人颅骨，口译。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpreting (SI) is a complex multi-task activity of interpreting which came into exsistance after the Nuremberg trials.
sentences.chinese: 同声传译是一项复杂的多任务口译活动。

definition: simultaneous interpretation (abbr. for 同聲傳譯|同声传译[tong2 sheng1 chuan2 yi4])

(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
